data.text:
Uma Musume that were aiming to debut used the 『Selection Race』 to 
show off their abilities, hoping to be scouted by trainers
data.processed:
<story>Uma Musume that were aiming to debut used the 『Selection Race』 to 
<story>show off their abilities, hoping to be scouted by trainers

data.text:
For Tracen Academy, it was one of the most important 
events. And today, that event was happening! Immediately 
when I arrived at the course―
data.processed:
<story>For Tracen Academy, it was one of the most important 
<story>events. And today, that event was happening! Immediately 
<story>when I arrived at the course―

data.text:
Oh? Are you, perhaps…… 
that lost trainer that I met the other day!?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Oh? Are you, perhaps…… 
<story>that lost trainer that I met the other day!?

data.text:
Fufufu, sorry about that. 
It was quite a memorable day, so I couldn't help it～
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Fufufu, sorry about that. 
<story>It was quite a memorable day, so I couldn't help it～

data.text:
You've come to watch the Selection Races, I see. 
I'm participating in the last group today, so 
I'd be happy if you stayed until then.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>You've come to watch the Selection Races, I see. 
<story>I'm participating in the last group today, so 
<story>I'd be happy if you stayed until then.

data.text:
Well then, I should go get prepared. 
The sunlight is a little strong, so be careful about that.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Well then, I should go get prepared. 
<story>The sunlight is a little strong, so be careful about that.

data.text:
With a gentle smile and calm voice that never wavered, 
Grass Wonder made her way to the course.
data.processed:
<story>With a gentle smile and calm voice that never wavered, 
<story>Grass Wonder made her way to the course.

data.text: And so, the races continued one after another―
data.processed: <story>And so, the races continued one after another―

data.text:
Awawawa, next up is my group……! 
I-I-I'm getting nervous～……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Awawawa, next up is my group……! 
<story>I-I-I'm getting nervous～……!

data.text:
Nahaha! Spe-chan, you're too stiff. 
At this rate, you'll turn to stone!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>Nahaha! Spe-chan, you're too stiff. 
<story>At this rate, you'll turn to stone!

data.text:
Stone!? 
T-then I won't be able to run～!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Stone!? 
<story>T-then I won't be able to run～!

data.text:
Now now, Spe-chan. 
Relax～, just relax～.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Now now, Spe-chan. 
<story>Relax～, just relax～.

data.text:
『Actions are the seeds of fate』. Spe-chan, you've spent this 
whole time training as hard as you could for today, right?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>『Actions are the seeds of fate』. Spe-chan, you've spent this 
<story>whole time training as hard as you could for today, right?

data.text:
All that's left is to believe in yourself and run as 
best as you can, and it should lead to good results.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>All that's left is to believe in yourself and run as 
<story>best as you can, and it should lead to good results.

data.text:
Grass-chan……! 
Uuuh, Thanks～……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Grass-chan……! 
<story>Uuuh, Thanks～……!

data.text:
Don't worry about it～. 
……Huh?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Don't worry about it～. 
<story>……Huh?

data.text:
Hmmm～…… El? 
Could you move over there a little bit?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Hmmm～…… El? 
<story>Could you move over there a little bit?

data.text:
Que? 
Haah, like this?
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>Que? 
<story>Haah, like this?

data.text:
Why are you asking this all 
of a sudden, Grass……!?
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>Why are you asking this all 
<story>of a sudden, Grass……!?

data.text:
Suddenly, an Uma Musume that was running in the race, 
came around the curve with too much momentum!
data.processed:
<story>Suddenly, an Uma Musume that was running in the race, 
<story>came around the curve with too much momentum!

data.text:
Wawawawawaa!! 
S-sorry……!!
data.name: Uma Musume Participant
data.processed:
<story>Wawawawawaa!! 
<story>S-sorry……!!

data.text:
Are you hurt～? 
Maybe you should get that looked at, just in case.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Are you hurt～? 
<story>Maybe you should get that looked at, just in case.

data.text: Yeah, I'll do that…… I'm really sorry about that!!
data.name: Uma Musume Participant
data.processed: <story>Yeah, I'll do that…… I'm really sorry about that!!

data.text: T-take care～……
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>T-take care～……

data.text:
Buhaaaaa! 
T-that scared me……!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>Buhaaaaa! 
<story>T-that scared me……!

data.text:
But that's amazing Grass-chan! 
There's no limit to how calm you can be……!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>But that's amazing Grass-chan! 
<story>There's no limit to how calm you can be……!!

data.text:
Fufu, no no～. 
El, I'm glad you're okay too～.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Fufu, no no～. 
<story>El, I'm glad you're okay too～.

data.text:
That girl, Grass Wonder……was it? Even at such a 
big event, she's so calm, huh! That kind of mental 
fortitude would be a powerful asset.
data.name: Rookie Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>That girl, Grass Wonder……was it? Even at such a 
<story>big event, she's so calm, huh! That kind of mental 
<story>fortitude would be a powerful asset.

data.text:
On top of that, it's not just her mentality…… Considering her 
results so far, her physical specs are high too. She'll be the 
favorite in the last group.
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>On top of that, it's not just her mentality…… Considering her 
<story>results so far, her physical specs are high too. She'll be the 
<story>favorite in the last group.

data.text:
And with everyone's attention focused on her, 
the race that Grass Wonder was participating in, began……!
data.processed:
<story>And with everyone's attention focused on her, 
<story>the race that Grass Wonder was participating in, began……!

data.text:
With everyone's attention on her, Grass Wonder took 
position in the middle, and it seemed like she was 
calmly observing the situation, however―
data.processed:
<story>With everyone's attention on her, Grass Wonder took 
<story>position in the middle, and it seemed like she was 
<story>calmly observing the situation, however―

data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>!? Ku……!!

data.text:
Ah, Grass Wonder is out in front! ……But, the way she's running 
right now, doesn't something seem a little off……?
data.name: Rookie Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Ah, Grass Wonder is out in front! ……But, the way she's running 
<story>right now, doesn't something seem a little off……?

data.text:
It looked like the girl running next to her 
stumbled a little too. The previous races might 
have left the course in poor condition.
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>It looked like the girl running next to her 
<story>stumbled a little too. The previous races might 
<story>have left the course in poor condition.

data.text: Grass might have pushed forward early to avoid a collision……
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed: <story>Grass might have pushed forward early to avoid a collision……

data.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa……!!
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Haa, haa, haa, haa……!!

data.text:
With 200m remaining, Grass Wonder is in the lead! 
But…… she's being chased!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>With 200m remaining, Grass Wonder is in the lead! 
<story>But…… she's being chased!

data.text:
Will Grass Wonder be able to stay ahead!? 
And the way this battle ends is――!!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Will Grass Wonder be able to stay ahead!? 
<story>And the way this battle ends is――!!

data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>……!!

data.text:
The result― Grass Wonder was passed at the very last moment, 
being beaten in to 2nd by a nose.
data.processed:
<story>The result― Grass Wonder was passed at the very last moment, 
<story>being beaten in to 2nd by a nose.

data.text:
Grass-chan, good work out there……! 
Um, well……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Grass-chan, good work out there……! 
<story>Um, well……

data.text:
……Hmmm～, it was unfortunate! 
It seems like I was one step short in the end～.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>……Hmmm～, it was unfortunate! 
<story>It seems like I was one step short in the end～.

data.text:
But, it was still a reasonable result. 
I'll do my best so that next time I can finish 1st.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>But, it was still a reasonable result. 
<story>I'll do my best so that next time I can finish 1st.

data.text:
Ah…… Y-yeah! 
Let's do our best together!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Ah…… Y-yeah! 
<story>Let's do our best together!

data.text:
Grass was so close, huh. If there wasn't that 
trouble in the middle of it, in terms of ability, 
I think she would have finished first……!
data.name: Rookie Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Grass was so close, huh. If there wasn't that 
<story>trouble in the middle of it, in terms of ability, 
<story>I think she would have finished first……!

data.text:
But her situational awareness is top notch. 
Grass Wonder, I'd definitely want her to join us……!
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>But her situational awareness is top notch. 
<story>Grass Wonder, I'd definitely want her to join us……!

data.text:
It was an unfortunate result, but the reactions were positive. 
There would definitely be a lot of people scouting her.
data.processed:
<story>It was an unfortunate result, but the reactions were positive. 
<story>There would definitely be a lot of people scouting her.

data.text: Or, that's what I thought―
data.processed: <story>Or, that's what I thought―

data.text: ……Grass!!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>……Grass!!

data.text:
Oh, El? 
Is something wrong?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Oh, El? 
<story>Is something wrong?

data.text:
If…… you're going to do more night training, 
I'll do it with you, okay?
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>If…… you're going to do more night training, 
<story>I'll do it with you, okay?

data.text:
……No, no, there was a race today, after all. 
I was planning on resting.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>……No, no, there was a race today, after all. 
<story>I was planning on resting.

data.text: Well then, I'll excuse myself here.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Well then, I'll excuse myself here.

data.text: ――『Grass Wonder is refusing all scouting requests』
data.processed: <story>――『Grass Wonder is refusing all scouting requests』

data.text: It wasn't long before that rumor started to circulate.
data.processed: <story>It wasn't long before that rumor started to circulate.
